author: Jon Brodkin
title: Verizon refuses to give DSL users its low-income deals during pandemic
description: Comcast impresses, but deals from Verizon, Charter, and others have problems.
content:
Enlarge/ A Verizon FiOS truck in Manhattan on September 15, 2017. 
5 with 4 posters participating
Verizon is one of numerous home-Internet providers offering temporarily free service to low-income households during the pandemic. But a big restriction on Ver… [+10392 chars]
